steps: Use an AED as soon as available and follow prompts.
items.disclaimer: Educational only. Not a substitute for certified training.

steps: Ask: 'Are you choking?' If unable to cough/speak, act.
Perform abdominal thrusts (Heimlich) until relief or unconscious.
If unconscious: call emergency services and begin CPR.
items.disclaimer: For infants: use back slaps/chest thrusts, not abdominal thrusts.

steps: Apply direct pressure with clean cloth or bandage.
Elevate if possible; do not remove soaked dressings—add layers.
Use a tourniquet for life-threatening limb bleeding if trained.
